channel.title: Comments on: Since I was going high school, I never been able to get a Nuke in-game. I finally got a Nuke after 10 years of playing the game.
channel.description: Call of Duty: Black Ops Cold War is a first-person shooter video game developed by Treyarch and Raven Software and published by Activision. r/BlackOpsColdWar is a developer-recognized community focused on the title.

item.title: By: emotionalaccountants
item.dc:creator: emotionalaccountants
item.description: I bet that was an amazing feeling finally. Here's to many more.
item.content:encoded: I bet that was an amazing feeling finally. Here’s to many more.

item.title: By: likeonions
item.dc:creator: likeonions
item.description: yeah I've still never gotten nuke

item.title: By: BadDragonSwaggin
item.dc:creator: BadDragonSwaggin
item.description: We used to get Intervention only nukes in MW2. Congratulations on your first my man.
item.content:encoded: We used to get Intervention only nukes in MW2. Congratulations on your first my man.

item.title: By: Tityfan808
item.dc:creator: Tityfan808
item.description: Nice work OP! Time for your first 100 bomb next!
item.content:encoded: Nice work OP! Time for your first 100 bomb next!

item.title: By: Loris2004
item.dc:creator: Loris2004
item.description: My game is over before I did the nuke, I was 20/0 and we won :',)
item.content:encoded: My game is over before I did the nuke, I was 20/0 and we won :’,)

item.title: By: damager001
item.dc:creator: damager001
item.description: Congrats now do it in core

item.title: By: PamStuff
item.dc:creator: PamStuff
item.description: Been playing since Black ops 1 and I've never gotten a nuke. Good job!
item.content:encoded: Been playing since Black ops 1 and I’ve never gotten a nuke. Good job!

item.title: By: kamSidd
item.dc:creator: kamSidd
item.description: Nice I also got my first actual nuke in Cold War. Got one and then got a 29 steak the next game . I did get a few 30 kill streaks in COD 4 but since there was no kill streak higher than the helo not sure if that counts.
item.content:encoded: Nice I also got my first actual nuke in Cold War. Got one and then got a 29 steak the next game ðŸ˜¬. I did get a few 30 kill streaks in COD 4 but since there was no kill streak higher than the helo not sure if that counts.
